description: These hearty cauliflower tofu burritos are filled with creamy avocado slices, garlicky roasted cauliflower and baked tofu, smothered in spicy tomato sauce.
name: Garlic Roasted Cauliflower and Spicy Baked Tofu Burritos
recipeIngredient: 1/4 cup chopped fresh cilantro, (plus extra for serving)
1 lb. extra firm tofu, (drained, pressed at least 15 minutes, and cut into 1/2 inch cubes)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 400o. Line a baking sheet with parchment.
Stir tomato sauce, cilantro, hot sauce, cumin, ancho chile powder, salt and pepper together in small bowl.

Arrange tofu cubes on parchment lined baking sheet. Brush with 1/4 cup of tomato sauce mixture. Bake 20 minutes, gently flip, and brush with another 1/4 cup of tomato sauce mixture, reserving the rest. Bake another 20 minutes. (40 minutes total.)
